title: SMC_NC_SourcePosition (Struct)
text:
TYPE SMC_NC_SourcePosition : STRUCT
Represents a source position consisting of a line number,
a column number (both zero-based), and a length.

rows.Name: diLine
rows.Comment: The zero-based line number. -1 if unknown.

rows.Name: diColumn
rows.Comment: The zero-based column number. -1 if unknown.
